Alert Name: bush
SEC group to study financial reporting system
In a move to make U.S. markets more competitive, the agency will examine how to make financial reporting less complex and costly.
06/27/07 02:36 PM, EDT
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission is forming an advisory committee to study how to make the U.S. financial reporting system less complex and costly, the agency said Wednesday.
